_sText:
Map created by PaPaGaLoS 2006

Updated & brought up-to-date by Hakk1tus & ICS

Hakk1tus found the map while searching new maps for the server but the map was little buggy and fps was kind of low. He contacted the original creator and Hakk1tus and I saw some potential in this map so we fixed and updated it a bit to be better. We kept the original layout pretty much the same, only 2 spots needed to be changed and more light added.

What we did was:

- fps fixes
- clipping fixes
- optimization fixes
- other minor fixes


Otherwise the map is basically the same. Fixed and edited with permission of original mapper, thanks to PaPaGaLoS.

This map has 64 spawns but its actually quite small. Recommended for servers up to 40 players.
